Name: Monte Carlo Imperial
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Monte Carlo Imperial contains 140 calories
